item.title: Competitive programming with python
item.description: ~~Is competitive programming a hobby or a time pass or only mental sports . No it is now a standard to fastify the process of recruitment of 10k+ resumes and get the best out of it ~~ Table Of Contents Why python for competitive programmingğŸ¤·ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸ Problems while using python in CPâš Resources for CP with pythonğŸ“š Approach for solving a problemğŸ–‹ One important noteğŸ“ Some cool programming questionsğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» Why python for competitive programmingğŸ¤·ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸ There are many programming languages with which one can approach to solve CP problems but in this blog we will focus on python and also some reasons why python can be a good choice for programming .

item.title: Solving Depth first search problem with Golang
item.description: Table Of Contents Let’s begin âœ Golang solution ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» Conclusion So we will be solving a hackerrank problem on Graph Data structures to understand how to implement this kind of problems in golang by this blog we will understand maps, slices, recursion, global variables, for loops in golang. Also we will understand what is connected component in graph and how to use the logic to ace in these type of problems .
